DEMON.desc:
???: Welcome Player to the world of Salor, a world very similar to earth, only this time... 
God doesn't affect this world. I do. 
You have been chosen to live a life, a life that matters. You will guide a child to their destiny 
That child's name is Sahir Poram.

TOWN1.desc:
Sahir wakes up on the streets of Pasier, a small desert town, with sand as far as the eye can see. The closest city is 2 days travel away. 
Sahir stands up and his stomach growls. He walks out of the alley where he spent the night and stands in the middle of the street. 
As he looks down the street he sees a bread vendor, a guardsman, and a cloaked man sitting at a box.

TUTOR.desc:
???: This is it Player, It's time to show you the ropes for guiding the child to his destiny. 
Soon you will be given a list of choices all with numbers attached to them. 
When asked, 'What you want the child to do?'; Enter the number associated with the action and press the Enter key

PTOWN.desc:
1: approach the bread vendor 
2: approach the cloaked man 
3: approach the guard

VENDR.desc:
Sahir approaches the bread vendor 
He reads a sign that says 'BREAD 5GP' 
1: Steal some bread
2: Buy some bread 
3: Back away from the vendor

STEAL.desc:
Sahir grabs a peice of bread and places it in his pocket 
Vendor: Hey kid, are you going to pay for that? 
Sahir starts to walk away 
Vendor: GUARD!!!!

BREAD.desc: Vendor: You wants some bread, that'll be 5 gold

CLOAK.desc:
Sahir walks up to the man, whose sitting at a table 
The table has a sign that says "Lets play a game" 
1: Play the game 
2: Back away

GAME.desc:
Cloaked Man: My game is simple, put down your bets and pull a paper out of the hat 
If you pull a black peice of paper, you lose 
If you pull a white peice of paper, you win 
Waddya say... wanna play? 
1: Yes 
2: No

CROOK.desc: Sahir takes a seat at the table

CAVE.desc:
Vangadar Cave... A place of mystery, no one has ever exited richer than when they entered. 
Sahir walks up to the cave, really hoping that today that will change 
Sahir enters the cave. Upon his entering, a fierce sandstorm begins to flail, making escape more dangerous than continuing. 
Sahir enters the room and finds three paths one to the left, one to the right, and one down the center 
1: Enter Left Path 
2: Enter Right Path 
3: Enter Center Path

LEFT.desc:
Sahir enters the path on the left. 
After walking for about 50 yards, Sahir arrives at a small room lit by a single torch. Inscribed on the wall, was the text: 
How the world in taken province 
Could stand on takes of stolen solace 
Shall the gods be held within 
The tyrants with fill this world with _______

NEWC.desc:
Sahir enters the cave. Upon his entering, a fierce sandstorm begins to flail, making escape more dangerous than continuing. 
Sahir enters the room and finds three paths one to the left, one to the right, and one down the center 
1: Enter Left Path 
2: Enter Right Path 
3: Enter Center Path

RIGHT.desc:
Sahir enters the path on the right. 
After walking for about 20 yards, Sahir arrives at a small room lit by a single torch. Inscribed on the wall, was the text: 
This land you know from shore to shore 
And seem to prosper in for time galore 
Shall fall under Darton's shadow, no more 
As long the good rule _______

CENT.desc: Sahir walks up the center hallway. When he gets to the end, Sahir looks at a door with seven holes around the door, and one in the actual door.

FINAL.desc:
The door opens and Sahir looks into the room, a white light shining brightly with no end in sight. 
Sahir walks into the light and disappears into the room
